data.name: Movavi Video Editor 14 Plus
data.detailed_description:
Have a vlog devoted to video games? Like to share your insights on technical equipment? Create high-quality videos with Chroma Key and Animation, handy on-screen tips, clear voice-over and audio effects with Movavi. With its support for Intel® HD Graphics technology, Video Editor Plus guarantees video processing without delays even in 4K. Share your videos with the whole world: upload them directly to YouTube.

Advanced video editing
  • Add video and graphics files in any format
  • Cut, crop, rotate, and trim clips
  • Choose from a wide range of filters and transitions
  • Enhance video quality: reduce camera shake, adjust colors
  • Make unique intros with customizable titles
  • Create pop-up tips using callouts
  • Replace backgrounds using the Chroma Key tool
  • Show multiple videos at the same time with Picture in Picture mode
  • Animate stickers, titles, callouts, and PiP videos

Explore the huge collection of built-in content: video and audio samples, backgrounds, and more.

Efficient audio editing
  • Add music and sound effects
  • Record a voiceover via microphone
  • Boost the volume of quiet audio files
  • Eliminate background noise
  • Adjust equalizer settings and add audio effects

Easy sharing
  • Export the results in MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, or any popular format
  • Share videos on YouTube directly from the app or upload them to your Google Drive
  • Prepare files for viewing on tablets, smartphones, and TVs
data.about_the_game:
Have a vlog devoted to video games? Like to share your insights on technical equipment? Create high-quality videos with Chroma Key and Animation, handy on-screen tips, clear voice-over and audio effects with Movavi. With its support for Intel® HD Graphics technology, Video Editor Plus guarantees video processing without delays even in 4K. Share your videos with the whole world: upload them directly to YouTube.

Advanced video editing
  • Add video and graphics files in any format
  • Cut, crop, rotate, and trim clips
  • Choose from a wide range of filters and transitions
  • Enhance video quality: reduce camera shake, adjust colors
  • Make unique intros with customizable titles
  • Create pop-up tips using callouts
  • Replace backgrounds using the Chroma Key tool
  • Show multiple videos at the same time with Picture in Picture mode
  • Animate stickers, titles, callouts, and PiP videos

Explore the huge collection of built-in content: video and audio samples, backgrounds, and more.

Efficient audio editing
  • Add music and sound effects
  • Record a voiceover via microphone
  • Boost the volume of quiet audio files
  • Eliminate background noise
  • Adjust equalizer settings and add audio effects

Easy sharing
  • Export the results in MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, or any popular format
  • Share videos on YouTube directly from the app or upload them to your Google Drive
  • Prepare files for viewing on tablets, smartphones, and TVs
data.short_description: Make your own Let’s Plays, video blog postings, and program tutorials with Movavi Video Editor Plus. Edit your footage with top-notch tools, delete unwanted fragments, add titles and transitions, use special effects. Then share the results on YouTube directly from the app.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible dual-core processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation
